title: MICROSOFT OFFICE 2018 WORD X64
description:
Update File ::

It has been UPDATE.
You will get more new feature in this Software.If you want to get more new feature, then you can download.

How to Install

1) "exe" file to install ...
2)RAR to Extract and install..
3)Instructions are included in ReadMe.txt if needed.
4)Use the key generator to generate a valid serial
5)Thats all, Done & enjoy



Play and enjoy


1. Disconnect from the Internet
2. Run setup (Perform-3Dv700setup.exe)
3. Run the keygen perform_3D_v7_kg.exe as administrator and in the keygen folder it will be generated a lservrc license file (~1KB)
4. Copy the license file to C:Program Files (x86)Computers and StructuresPERFORM-3D7PERFORM-3D7Program
5. Make sure Perform-3D.exe is blocked at the Firewall from connecting to the Internet

The How-to-crack above works. If the error "...license file missing etc etc" repeat the step above
License is valid for 308 days starting from 29/3/2018 (ends somewhere in mid December 2018). If you want this time not to end :
1. Change time at your windows clock and put it some years before 2017
2. Wait for the next Perform-3D update (Version 8 or 7.x.x) coming in the beggining of year 2019 (or earlier 2018) or another crack.
Until then support by keeping this torrent alive by seeding it or adding it to a seedbox, trust me it's worth the share!
